wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Arnold Hughes Eagleton Reading  (3 April 1896 – 4 January 1975) was an English first-class cricketer and Royal Marines officer. He served in the Royal Marines from 1914–1946, rising to the rank of major-general, in addition to playing first-class cricket for the Royal Navy.

response: *Major General Arnold Hughes Eagleton Reading, Royal Marines.
